item.title: Mapping out two silhouettes: On the cinematic connection
item.description: Since a very early age I feel this innate tendency of trying to operate from inside my comfort zone. I have meant to do things without people knowing especially when they didnâ€™t come across as even remotely doable. But at the same time there were always these deeply humanist emotions and overtly sentimental thought processes and now looking back I can never make out why the two character elements never clashed.
